attributes.action: Keyworkers to get 80% income if they become sick and have to stay home
attributes.additional_details: As keyworkers we are crucial to stop coronavirus from spreading. Everyday is a risk to get it. We should be assured that we will also get 80% of income in case of getting ill.
attributes.background: People that lost their jobs are allowed to stay home and get 80% of their income. Keyworkers are at the high risk of getting the virus and if they do they will only be getting SSP
